I am a third-year Economics PhD student at the <a href="https://cla.umn.edu/about/directory/profile/cohen770" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: underline;text-decoration-style: solid;">University of Minnesota</a>, and a Research Analyst at the <a href="https://www.minneapolisfed.org/economic-research/economists" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: underline;text-decoration-style: solid;">Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis</a>.

My research interests are broadly in Macro-Finance, Monetary Economics, Search and Matching models, and Computational methods.

Previously, I have worked for the Bank of England (where I was a Graduate Research Intern in Summer 2025), as well as the Federal Reserve Board (where I was a Graduate Research Intern in Summer 2024, and before that a Research Assistant).

Have a look at my [**CV**](files/cv/ethan-cohen-cv.pdf) and my [**research**](research.qmd).
